Available Globally.base_description: Everything concerning my awesome Destiny 2 LFG system

sub_commands.name: lfg add
sub_commands.description: This adds people into the main roster of an LFG event, even if is full

options.name: lfg_id
options.description: The lfg event ID

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to add

sub_commands.name: lfg create
sub_commands.description: Creates an LFG event

options.name: activity
options.description: The name of the activity

options.name: start_time
options.description: Format: HH:MM DD/MM - When the event is supposed to start. asap to start as soon as it fills up

options.name: timezone
options.description: What timezone you are in

options.name: overwrite_max_members
options.description: You can overwrite the maximum number of people that can join your event

sub_commands.name: lfg delete
sub_commands.description: When you fucked up and need to delete an event

options.name: lfg_id
options.description: The lfg event ID

sub_commands.name: lfg edit
sub_commands.description: When you fucked up and need to edit an event

options.name: lfg_id
options.description: The lfg event ID

options.name: activity
options.description: Use this is you want to edit the name of the activity

options.name: start_time
options.description: Format: HH:MM DD/MM - Use this is you want to edit the start time of the activity

options.name: timezone
options.description: Use this is you want to edit the start time of the activity

options.name: overwrite_max_members
options.description: Use this is you want to edit the maximum number participants of the activity

sub_commands.name: lfg joined
sub_commands.description: Shows you an overview of all LFG events you have joined

sub_commands.name: lfg kick
sub_commands.description: Kick a user from an lfg event

options.name: lfg_id
options.description: The lfg event ID

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to kick

Available Globally.base_description: Display Destiny 2 leaderboards. Pick **only** one leaderboard from all options

sub_commands.name: rank server
sub_commands.description: Show all server members on the leaderboard

options.name: discord_leaderboards
options.description: Leaderboards concerning this discord server
choices: Roles Earned on this Discord Server

options.name: basic_leaderboards
options.description: Leaderboards concerning basic Destiny 2 stats

options.name: endgame_leaderboards
options.description: Leaderboards concerning stats in Destiny 2 endgame activities

options.name: activity_leaderboards
options.description: Leaderboards concerning stats in Destiny 2 activities. Input the sought activity in activity

options.name: weapon_leaderboards
options.description: Leaderboards concerning Destiny 2 weapon stats. Input the sought weapon in weapon

options.name: activity
options.description: If are looking for a activity_leaderboards, please select the activity

options.name: weapon
options.description: If are looking for a weapon_leaderboards, please select the weapon

options.name: reverse
options.description: If you want to reverse the sorting: Default: False

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to look up

Available Globally.base_description: Everything concerning Destiny 2 weapons and their usage

sub_commands.name: weapons weapon
sub_commands.description: Shows Destiny 2 weapon stats for the specified weapon

options.name: weapon
options.description: The weapon you want to look up

options.name: mode
options.description: Restrict the game mode. Default: All modes

options.name: activity
options.description: Restrict the activity. Overwrites mode. Default: All activities

options.name: destiny_class
options.description: Restrict the class. Default: All classes

options.name: expansion
options.description: Restrict the expansion. Default: All expansions

options.name: season
options.description: Restrict the season. Default: All seasons

options.name: start_time
options.description: Format: DD/MM/YY - Input the **earliest** date you want the weapon stats for. Default: Big Bang

options.name: end_time
options.description: Format: DD/MM/YY - Input the **latest** date you want the weapon stats for. Default: Now

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to look up

Available Globally.base_description: Use these commands to setup ElevatorBot on this server

sub_commands.name: setup bungie_feed
sub_commands.description: Designate a channel where bungie articles get posted

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel where the messages should be displayed

options.name: message_id
options.description: You can input a message ID (needs to be from me and selected channel) to have me edit that message

sub_commands.name: setup clan join
sub_commands.description: Designate a channel where players can join your Destiny 2 clan by pressing a button. They will receive an invite by the person which used /setup clan link

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel where the message should be displayed

options.name: message_id
options.description: You can input a message ID (needs to be from me and selected channel) to have me edit that message

sub_commands.name: setup clan link
sub_commands.description: Links your own Destiny 2 clan with the discord server this was executed in

sub_commands.name: setup clan unlink
sub_commands.description: Unlinks the current Destiny 2 clan and the discord server this was executed in

sub_commands.name: setup increment_button
sub_commands.description: Creates a button that users can click and increment. Whoever gets the 69420 click wins

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel where the message should be displayed

options.name: message_id
options.description: You can input a message ID (needs to be from me and selected channel) to have me edit that message

sub_commands.name: setup lfg channel
sub_commands.description: Designate a channel where my LFG events get posted

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel where the message should be displayed

sub_commands.name: setup lfg voice_category
sub_commands.description: Designate a category channel under which my LFG voice channels get created. If you want me to automatically create voice channels for each LFG event, use this to set it up

options.name: channel
options.description: The category channel where the voice channels should be anchored

sub_commands.name: setup overview
sub_commands.description: Gives you an overview over my setting for this server

sub_commands.name: setup registered_role
sub_commands.description: Designate the role that is given to people that /register with me

options.name: role
options.description: The role to link

sub_commands.name: setup registration
sub_commands.description: Designate a channel in which user can register with me by pressing a button

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel where the message should be displayed

options.name: message_id
options.description: You can input a message ID (needs to be from me and selected channel) to have me edit that message
